lines.gurmukhi: mn bc kRm kY piqbRq krY jau nwir qwih mn bc kRm cwhq Bqwr hY
lines.transliteration_english: Man Bach Kram Kai Patibrat Karai Jau Naari , Taahi Man Bach Kram Chaahat Bhataar Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: If a wife discharges her duties faithfully and loyally and is devoted to her husband, such a wife is loved dearly by her husband.

lines.gurmukhi: ABrn isMgwr cwr ishjw sMjog Bog skl kutMb hI mY qw ko jYkwru hY
lines.transliteration_english: Abharan Singaar Chaar Sihajaa Sanjog Bhoga , Sakal Koutanb Hee Mai Taa Ko Jaikaaru Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Such a lady is blessed with the opportunity of adoring herself and meeting with her husband. Being virtuous she is praised and appreciated by the whole family.

lines.gurmukhi: shj AwnMd suK mMgl suhwg Bwg suMdr mMdr Cib soBq sucwru hY
lines.transliteration_english: Sahaj Aanand Soukh Mangal Suhaag Bhaaga , Soundar Mandar Chhabi Sobhat Souchaaru Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: She acquires the comforts of married life gently and gradually. Because of the beauty of her high merits she adores the beautiful mansions with her presence.

lines.gurmukhi: siqgur isKn kau rwKq giRsiq mY swvDwn Awn dyv syv Bwau duibDw invwr hY ]480]
lines.transliteration_english: Satigur Sikhan Kau Raakhat Grisati Mai Saavadhaana , Aan Dayv Sayv Bhaau Doubidhaa Nivaar Hai ?480?

Shabad OS B.translation: Similarly, the Sikhs of the Guru who love the True Guru from the core of their hearts, are kept conscious by the True Guru even when they are spending house-holders life. True Guru removes the duality of their devotion and worship of gods and goddesses. (
